Producer: Luc Des Groseillers, Nate Parker, Adam Mutchler, Hernany Perla
Rating: R (Pervasive Language|Brief Graphic Nudity|Some Drug Use|Strong Sexual Content|Violence)
Synopsis: The horny spirit of an Asian prostitute wants a piece of the action when two roommates (Carlos Santos, J.R. Villarreal) try to woo a beautiful ghost-hunter (Fernanda Romero) who's trying to prove their house is haunted.
Title: Ghost Team One
